required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Observational Study of Type 1 and Type 2 Diabetes Patients Having Switched From Human Premixes to NovoMix速30
clinical_study.official_title: A Prospective, Multicentre, Open Label, Non-controlled, Observational, 24-week Study in Patients Using NovoMix速 30 (Biphasic Insulin Aspart 30) for Treatment of Type 1 and Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus in Romania

brief_summary.textblock: This trial is conducted in Europe. The aim of this observational study is to evaluate the blood glucose control (HbA1c) using NovoMix速 30 for treatment of type 1 and type 2 diabetes under normal clinical practice conditions in Romania.

primary_outcome.time_frame: For the duration of the study

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of subjects achieving HbA1c below 7.0% and below or equal to 6.5%
secondary_outcome.time_frame: after 12 weeks and 24 weeks of treatment
after 12 weeks and 24 weeks of treatment
after 12 weeks and 24 weeks of treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in insulin dose and number of injections
secondary_outcome.time_frame: at 12 weeks and 24 weeks of treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in oral antidiabetic drug therapy
secondary_outcome.time_frame: after 12 weeks and 24 weeks of treatment
at 12 weeks and 24 weeks of treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in number of hypoglycaemic events
secondary_outcome.time_frame: during 4 weeks proceeding routine visits at 12 weeks and 24 weeks of treatment
after 12 weeks and 24 weeks of treatment

intervention.description: Start dose and frequency prescribed by the physician as a result of a normal clinical evaluation

study_pop.textblock: Type 1 and type 2 diabetes patients inadequately controlled on human premixes

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Type 1 and type 2 diabetics who are treated with human premix insulin (the selection of the subjects will be at the discretion of the individual physician).
Exclusion Criteria:
- Subjects currently being treated with biphasic insulin aspart 30
- Subjects who were previously enrolled in this study
- Subjects with a hypersensitivity to biphasic insulin aspart 30 or to any of the excipients
- Women who are pregnant or have the intention of becoming pregnant within next 6 months
- Children below 10 years of age

intervention_browse.mesh_term: Insulin aspart, insulin aspart protamine drug combination 30:70
